apihelp-editmassmessagelist-summary: Edit a mass message delivery list.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-param-spamli: Title of the delivery list to update.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-param-add: Titles to add to the list.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-param-remove: Titles to remove from the list.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-param-descri: New description for the delivery list.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-param-minor: Whether the edit should be marked as minor in the history of the list.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-param-watchl: Unconditionally add or remove the page from the current user's watchlist, use preferences (ignored for bot users) or do not change watch.
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-example-1: Add [[User talk:Foo]] and [[Talk:Bar]] to the delivery list [[Example]] and remove [[Talk:Baz]] from it
apihelp-editmassmessagelist-example-2: Set the description of the delivery list [[Example]] to be "FooBar delivery services"
apihelp-massmessage-summary: Send a message to a list of pages.
apihelp-massmessage-param-spamlist: Page containing list of pages to leave a message on.
apihelp-massmessage-param-page-message: Page to be sent along with the message body.
apihelp-massmessage-example-1: Send a message to the list at [[Signpost Spamlist]] with the subject "New Signpost", and message body of "Please read it".
apihelp-massmessage-example-2: Send a message to the list at [[Signpost Spamlist]] with the subject "New Signpost", and the message as the content of the page "Help Page".
apihelp-massmessage-example-3: Send a message to the list at [[Signpost Spamlist]] with the subject "New Signpost", and message body of "Please read it" appended with the content from page "Help Page".
apihelp-query+mmcontent-summary: Get the description and targets of a spamlist
apihelp-query+mmcontent-example-1: Get page and spamlist information of [[Spam list]]
